text:
The Nightwood is a large forest in central [[Karrnath]], spanning the space between the major cities of [[Korth]], [[Atur]], [[Vedykar]], and [[Karrlakton]]. The forest’s fringes serve as a hunting preserve, but not far inside, the woods become trackless, filled with dark and terrible creatures. While the forest does have several [[manifest zone]]s to [[Mabar]], the [[aberrant|aberration]] nature of the creatures of the deep woods suggest a different origin. Some foresters claim that burgeoning evil swells from an oozing wound at the wood’s center, a deep chasm leading into the bowels of [[Khyber]]. Few can substantiate these assertions, but the hideous things emerging from the shadows suggest some truth to the rumors.

One of the finest beers in [[Khorvaire]], Nightwood ale, takes its name from this forest, as it is brewed in villages on its fringes.
title: Nightwood
tooltip: forest in central Karrnath, hunting preserve, a passage to Khyber may lie deep within
